metadata.title: CVE-2023-52591 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:reiserfs: Avoid touching renamed directory if parent does not change TheVFS will not be locking moved directory if its parent does not change.Change reiserfs rename code to avoid touching renamed directory if itsparent does not change as without locking that can corrupt the filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
